synopsis.text: Men in Black meets high school romance in this heartwarming sci-fi comedy! Narue Nanase appears to be your average schoolgirl, but she's hiding a cosmic secret: she's an alien with extraordinary abilities. As she navigates the challenges of adolescence, her life becomes even more complicated when she falls for Kazuto Iizuka, a boy from her school. Surrounded by a cast of eccentric extraterrestrial characters, Narue must balance her intergalactic responsibilities with the trials and tribulations of first love. Join this unlikely couple as they face off against androids, alien invaders, and the everyday challenges of growing up. This anime is a charming blend of humor, action, and romance that will leave you laughing and rooting for the heroine from outer space.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
